title: 【命令】将一条1.12的命令修改成1.13的格式
author: (=°ω°)丿

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
/tag @a add boots {Inventory:[{Slot:100b,id:"minecraft:leather_boots",tag:{Tags:["boots"]}}]}

另外我不是很懂你为什么要给物品加Tags:["boots"]

replies.author: (=°ω°)丿
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Teenager_Yang 于 2018-8-15 12:49 编辑 
pineapple_ 发表于 2017-12-2 11:32
/tag @a add boots {Inventory:[{Slot:100b,id:"minecraft:leather_boots",tag:{Tags:["boots"]}}]}

另外 ...
其实我也不知道……

replies.author: pineapple_
replies.txt_content:
Teenager_Yang 发表于 2017-12-2 11:45
因为Tags:["boots"]的鞋子不容易被仿造
忘记1.13选择器改了

Tags:[""]是实体标签

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
pineapple_ 发表于 2017-12-2 11:32
/tag @a add boots {Inventory:[{Slot:100b,id:"minecraft:leather_boots",tag:{Tags:["boots"]}}]}

另外 ...
好像错了吧

replies.author: ruhuasiyu
replies.txt_content:
pineapple_ 发表于 2017-12-2 11:57
忘记1.13选择器改了

Tags:[""]是实体标签
然而一个物品带上Tags也没啥事……
